pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:0.5_0: Ime kho panāyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.3_0: So tena kiso hoti lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.4_0: Addasa kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ kisaṁ lūkhaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṁ dhamanisanthatagattaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.5_0: “kissa tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.6_0: Kacci no tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.8_0: “Tena hi tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, yāvadatthaṁ bhuñja yāvadatthaṁ supa yāvadatthaṁ nhāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.9_0: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā te anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.9_1: anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.10_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, kappati evarūpaṁ kātun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.12_0: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako yāvadatthaṁ bhuñji yāvadatthaṁ supi yāvadatthaṁ nhāyi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.13_0: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.13_1: anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.14_0: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako aparena samayena vaṇṇavā ahosi pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.15_0: Atha kho āyasmato seyyasakassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.16_2: kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.17_0: So dāni tvaṁ etarahi vaṇṇavā pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.18_0: Kiṁ nu kho tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, bhesajjaṁ karosī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.20_0: Api cāhaṁ yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjāmi yāvadatthaṁ supāmi yāvadatthaṁ nhāyāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.21_0: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā me anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.1.21_1: anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.1_2: yeneva hatthena saddhādeyyaṁ bhuñjasi teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.3_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.4_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocessatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.7_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, seyyasaka, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.10_0: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.11_0: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.12_0: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.15_2: mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.16_3: madanimmadanāya pipāsavinayāya ālayasamugghātāya vaṭṭupacchedāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya nibbānāya dhammo desito?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.18_0: Netaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṁ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.19_0: Atha khvetaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānañceva appasādāya, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.20_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.21_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:1.2.23_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā niddaṁ okkamanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.2_0: Tesaṁ muṭṭhassatīnaṁ asampajānānaṁ niddaṁ okkamantānaṁ supinantena asuci muccati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.8_0: Kacci nu kho mayaṁ saṅghādisesaṁ āpattiṁ āpannā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.1.12_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.5_0: nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ takkavaṇṇaṁ dakavaṇṇaṁ telavaṇṇaṁ khīravaṇṇaṁ dadhivaṇṇaṁ sappivaṇṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:2.2.12_0: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Tenapi vuccati—“saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.1_0: Ajjhattarūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.2_0: Bahiddhārūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.3_0: Ajjhattabahiddhārūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.4_0: Ākāse kaṭiṁ kampento ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.5_0: Rāgūpatthambhe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.6_0: Vaccūpatthambhe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.7_0: Passāvūpatthambhe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.8_0: Vātūpatthambhe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.9_0: Uccāliṅgapāṇakadaṭṭhūpatthambhe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.10.1_0: Ārogyatthāya ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.19_0: davatthāya ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.20.1_0: Nīlaṁ ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.3.29_0: sappivaṇṇaṁ ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.4.9_0: ārogyatthañca davatthañca ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.5.93.1_0: Timūlakampi catumūlakampi pañcamūlakampi chamūlakampi sattamūlakampi aṭṭhamūlakampi navamūlakampi evameva vitthāretabbaṁ.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:3.8.1_0: Nīlaṁ mocessāmīti ceteti upakkamati pītakaṁ muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss1:5.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno supinantena asuci mucci.
